en.latex: If it takes \( 1 \) person to carry \( 3 \) boxes, how many people are needed to carry \( 31 \) boxes?
en.html: If it takes \( 1 \) person to carry \( 3 \) boxes, how many people are needed to carry \( 31 \) boxes?

af.latex: As dit \( 1 \) persoon neem om \( 3 \) bokse te dra, hoeveel mense sal benodig word om \( 31 \) bokse te dra?
af.html: As dit \( 1 \) persoon neem om \( 3 \) bokse te dra, hoeveel mense sal benodig word om \( 31 \) bokse te dra?

en.latex:
Each person can carry \( 3 \) boxes. So we need to divide \( 31 \) by \( 3 \) to find out how many people are needed to carry \( 31 \) boxes.
\( \frac{31}{3} = 10,3333 \ldots \)
Therefore \( 11 \) people are needed to carry \( 31 \) boxes. We cannot have \( 0,333 \) of a person so we round up to the nearest whole number.
en.html:
Each person can carry \( 3 \) boxes. So we need to divide \( 31 \) by \( 3 \) to find out how many people are needed to carry \( 31 \) boxes.
\( \frac{31}{3} = 10,3333 \ldots \)
Therefore \( 11 \) people are needed to carry \( 31 \) boxes. We cannot have \( 0,333 \) of a person so we round up to the nearest whole number.

af.latex:
Elke persoon kan \( 3 \) bokse dra. So ons moet \( 31 \) deur \( 3 \) deel om uit te vind hoeveel mense benodig word om \( 31 \) bokse te dra.
\( \frac{31}{3} = 10,3333 \ldots \) .
Daarom word \( 11 \) mense benodig om \( 31 \) bokse te dra. Ons kan nie \( 0,333 \) van 'n persoon hê nie so ons rond tot die naaste heelgetal op.
af.html:
Elke persoon kan \( 3 \) bokse dra. So ons moet \( 31 \) deur \( 3 \) deel om uit te vind hoeveel mense benodig word om \( 31 \) bokse te dra.
\( \frac{31}{3} = 10,3333 \ldots \) .
Daarom word \( 11 \) mense benodig om \( 31 \) bokse te dra. Ons kan nie \( 0,333 \) van 'n persoon hê nie so ons rond tot die naaste heelgetal op.

en.latex: If \( 7 \) tickets cost \( \text{R}35,20 \) , how much does one ticket cost?
en.html: If \( 7 \) tickets cost \( \text{R}35,20 \) , how much does one ticket cost?

af.latex: As \( 7 \) kaartjies \( \text{R}35,20 \) kos, hoeveel sal een kaartjie kos?
af.html: As \( 7 \) kaartjies \( \text{R}35,20 \) kos, hoeveel sal een kaartjie kos?

en.latex:
Since \( 7 \) tickets cost \( \text{R}35,20 \) , \( 1 \) ticket must cost \( \text{R}35,20 \) divided by \( 7 \) .
\( \frac{35,20}{7} =5,028571429 \)
Therefore one ticket costs \( \text{R}5,03 \) . Money should be rounded off to \( 2 \) decimal places.
en.html:
Since \( 7 \) tickets cost \( \text{R}35,20 \) , \( 1 \) ticket must cost \( \text{R}35,20 \) divided by \( 7 \) .
\( \frac{35,20}{7} =5,028571429 \)
Therefore one ticket costs \( \text{R}5,03 \) . Money should be rounded off to \( 2 \) decimal places.

af.latex:
Aangesien \( 7 \) kaartjies R \( 35,20 \) kos, sal \( 1 \) kaartjie R \( 35,20 \) gedeel deur \( 7 \) kos.
\( \frac{35,20}{7} =5,028571429 \)
Daarom sal een kaartjie R \( 5,03 \) kos. Geld moet tot \( 2 \) desimale plekke afgerond word.
af.html:
Aangesien \( 7 \) kaartjies R \( 35,20 \) kos, sal \( 1 \) kaartjie R \( 35,20 \) gedeel deur \( 7 \) kos.
\( \frac{35,20}{7} =5,028571429 \)
Daarom sal een kaartjie R \( 5,03 \) kos. Geld moet tot \( 2 \) desimale plekke afgerond word.

en.latex: Calculate the area of \( ABDE \) to \( 2 \) decimal places.
en.html: Calculate the area of \( ABDE \) to \( 2 \) decimal places.

af.latex: Bereken die oppervlakte van \( ABDE \) tot \( 2 \) desimale plekke:
af.html: Bereken die oppervlakte van \( ABDE \) tot \( 2 \) desimale plekke:

en.latex:
\( ABDE \) is a square and so the area is just the length squared.
\( \begin{align} &A = l^{2}
= \pi^2 \\&
= 9,86904 \ldots \\&
\approx 9,87 \end{align} \)
en.html:
\( ABDE \) is a square and so the area is just the length squared.
\( \begin{align} &A = l^{2}
= \pi^2 \\&
= 9,86904 \ldots \\&
\approx 9,87 \end{align} \)

af.latex:
\( ABDE \) is 'n vierkant so die oppervlakte is net die lengte tot die mag \( 2 \).
\( \begin{align} &A = l^{2}
= \pi^2 \\&
= 9,86904 \ldots \\&
\approx 9,87 \end{align} \)
af.html:
\( ABDE \) is 'n vierkant so die oppervlakte is net die lengte tot die mag \( 2 \).
\( \begin{align} &A = l^{2}
= \pi^2 \\&
= 9,86904 \ldots \\&
\approx 9,87 \end{align} \)

en.latex: Calculate the area of \( \triangle BCD \) to \( 2 \) decimal places.
en.html: Calculate the area of \( \triangle BCD \) to \( 2 \) decimal places.

af.latex: Bereken die oppervlakte van \( \triangle BCD \) tot \( 2 \) desimale plekke.
af.html: Bereken die oppervlakte van \( \triangle BCD \) tot \( 2 \) desimale plekke.

en.latex:
\( BCD \) is a right-angled triangle and so we have the perpendicular height. The area is:
\( \begin{align} & A = \frac{1}{2} b h
= \frac{1}{2} \pi^2 \\&
= 4,934802 \ldots
\approx 4,93 \end{align} \)
en.html:
\( BCD \) is a right-angled triangle and so we have the perpendicular height. The area is:
\( \begin{align} & A = \frac{1}{2} b h
= \frac{1}{2} \pi^2 \\&
= 4,934802 \ldots
\approx 4,93 \end{align} \)

af.latex:
\( BCD \) is 'n reghoekige driehoek so ons het 'n loodregte hoogte. Die oppervlakte is:
\( \begin{align} & A = \frac{1}{2} b h
= \frac{1}{2} \pi^2 \\&
= 4,934802 \ldots
\approx 4,93 \end{align} \)
af.html:
\( BCD \) is 'n reghoekige driehoek so ons het 'n loodregte hoogte. Die oppervlakte is:
\( \begin{align} & A = \frac{1}{2} b h
= \frac{1}{2} \pi^2 \\&
= 4,934802 \ldots
\approx 4,93 \end{align} \)

en.latex: Using you answers in ( \( a \) ) and ( \( b \) ) calculate the area of \( ABCDE \) .
en.html: Using you answers in ( \( a \) ) and ( \( b \) ) calculate the area of \( ABCDE \) .

af.latex: Deur jou antwoord in ( \( a \) ) en ( \( b \) ) te gebruik, bereken die oppervlakte van \( ABCDE \) .
af.html: Deur jou antwoord in ( \( a \) ) en ( \( b \) ) te gebruik, bereken die oppervlakte van \( ABCDE \) .

en.latex:
The area of \( ABCDE \) is the sum of the areas of \( ABDE \) and \( BCD \) .
\( A = 9,87 + 4,93 \approx 14,80 \)
en.html:
The area of \( ABCDE \) is the sum of the areas of \( ABDE \) and \( BCD \) .
\( A = 9,87 + 4,93 \approx 14,80 \)

af.latex:
Die oppervlakte van \( ABCDE \) is die som van die oppervlaktes van \( ABDE \) en \( BCD \) .
\( A = 9,87 + 4,93 \approx 14,80 \)
af.html:
Die oppervlakte van \( ABCDE \) is die som van die oppervlaktes van \( ABDE \) en \( BCD \) .
\( A = 9,87 + 4,93 \approx 14,80 \)

en.latex: Calculate \( i \) correct to \( 2 \) decimal places.
en.html: Calculate \( i \) correct to \( 2 \) decimal places.

af.latex: Bereken \( i \) korrek tot \( 2 \) desimale plekke.
af.html: Bereken \( i \) korrek tot \( 2 \) desimale plekke.

en.latex: Using your answer from ( \( 4.1 \) ), calculate \( A \) in \( A = P(1+ i)^n \) .
en.html: Using your answer from ( \( 4.1 \) ), calculate \( A \) in \( A = P(1+ i)^n \) .

af.latex: Deur jou antwoord vanuit ( \( 4.1 \) ) te gebruik, bereken \( A \) in \( A = P(1+ i)^n \) .
af.html: Deur jou antwoord vanuit ( \( 4.1 \) ) te gebruik, bereken \( A \) in \( A = P(1+ i)^n \) .

en.latex: Calculate \( A \) without rounding off your answer in ( \(4.1\) ), compare this answer with your answer in ( \(4.2\) ).
en.html: Calculate \( A \) without rounding off your answer in ( \(4.1\) ), compare this answer with your answer in ( \(4.2\) ).

af.latex: Bereken \( A \) sonder om jou antwoord in ( \( 4.1 \) ) af te rond en vergelyk hierdie antwoord met jou antwoord in ( \( 4.2 \) ).
af.html: Bereken \( A \) sonder om jou antwoord in ( \( 4.1 \) ) af te rond en vergelyk hierdie antwoord met jou antwoord in ( \( 4.2 \) ).

en.latex:
\( \begin{align} & A = P(1+ i)^n \\&
A = 200 \ 000\left(1+ \frac{7,4}{600}\right)^{96} \\&
= 648 \ 768,22 \end{align} \)
There is a \( R128 \ 913,63 \) difference between the answer in ( \( 4.2 \) ) and the one calculated without rounding until the final step.
en.html:
\( \begin{align} & A = P(1+ i)^n \\&
A = 200 \ 000\left(1+ \frac{7,4}{600}\right)^{96} \\&
= 648 \ 768,22 \end{align} \)
There is a \( R128 \ 913,63 \) difference between the answer in ( \( 4.2 \) ) and the one calculated without rounding until the final step.

af.latex:
\( \begin{align} & A = P(1+ i)^n \\&
A = 200 \ 000\left(1+ \frac{7,4}{600}\right)^{96} \\&
= 648 \ 768,22 \end{align} \)
Daar is 'n \( R128 \ 913,63 \) verskil tussen die antwoord in ( \( 4.2 \) ) en die antwoord wat bereken was sonder om tot op die finale stap af te rond.
af.html:
\( \begin{align} & A = P(1+ i)^n \\&
A = 200 \ 000\left(1+ \frac{7,4}{600}\right)^{96} \\&
= 648 \ 768,22 \end{align} \)
Daar is 'n \( R128 \ 913,63 \) verskil tussen die antwoord in ( \( 4.2 \) ) en die antwoord wat bereken was sonder om tot op die finale stap af te rond.
